sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; const CheckoutForm: React.FC = () => { const [selectedPaymentMethod, setSelectedPaymentMethod] = useState("creditCard"); const orderItems = [ { id: 1, name: "Basic Tee", color: "Black", size: "Large", price: 32.0, imageUrl: "https://via.placeholder.com/50", quantity: 1, }, { id: 2, name: "Basic Tee", color: "Sienna", size: "Large", price: 32.0, imageUrl: "https://via.placeholder.com/50", quantity: 1, }, ]; const subtotal = orderItems.reduce( (total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0 ); const shipping = orderItems.length > 0 ? 5.0 : 0; const taxes = orderItems.length > 0 ? 5.52 : 0; const total = subtotal + shipping + taxes; const handleConfirmOrder = async () => { if (selectedPaymentMethod === "paypal") { const createOrder = async () => { const response = await fetch("/create-paypal-order", { method: "POST", }); const data = await response.json(); return data.orderID; }; const onApprove = (data, actions) => { return actions.order.capture().then((details) => { alert("Transaction completed by " + details.payer.name.given_name); // Handle successful transaction here }); }; const onError = (err) => { console.error(err); alert("An error occurred during the transaction."); }; // Load the PayPal SDK script if it's not already loaded if (!window.paypal) { const script = document.createElement("script"); script.src = "https://www.paypal.com/sdk/js?client-id=YOUR_CLIENT_ID"; script.onload = () => { window.paypal .Buttons({ createOrder: (data, actions) => createOrder(), onApprove: (data, actions) => onApprove(data, actions), onError: (err) => onError(err), }) .render("#paypal-button-container"); }; document.body.appendChild(script); } else { window.paypal .Buttons({ createOrder: (data, actions) => createOrder(), onApprove: (data, actions) => onApprove(data, actions), onError: (err) => onError(err), }) .render("#paypal-button-container"); } } else { // Handle other payment methods here } }; return (

EARLYBIRD
{/* Contact Information and Shipping Information */}

CONTACT

SHIPPING INFORMATION

PAYMENT METHOD

setSelectedPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} className="mr-2" />
{selectedPaymentMethod === "creditCard" && (
)}
setSelectedPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} className="mr-2" />
setSelectedPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} className="mr-2" />
{/* Order Summary */}

Order summary

{orderItems.length === 0 ? (

Your cart is empty

) : (
{orderItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.color} - {item.size}

${item.price.toFixed(2)}

{item.quantity}
))}
Subtotal ${subtotal.toFixed(2)}
Shipping ${shipping.toFixed(2)}
Taxes ${taxes.toFixed(2)}
Total ${total.toFixed(2)}
)} {/* PayPal button container */}
); }; export default CheckoutForm;
